Bibliographic References: PP, no. 252; PPSupp, no. 343.; LIMC III, p.714, Elektra I 39, pi. 547,3.
Imagery Description: Woman wearing black chiton, holding fillet in r. hand and hydria with two sprays in 1., nude youth wearing pilos and chlamys, and holding spear in r. hand (Electra and Orestes), beside a stele. Below the handles: female heads, with beaded sphendonai.
